title: Garrys.Mod.v13.06.07-v13.12.06.Update
description:
===========================================
Instructions
===========================================

1. Extract all the contents from the rar file to your Garry's Mod folder and overwrite when asked

2. Run the "Remove_old_files.bat" script to remove old and unused files

3. Launch the game as usual

===========================================
Changelog v13.12.06
===========================================

Unknown, but likely small fixes

===========================================
Changelog v13.12.05
===========================================

FIX  Fixed Lua exploits
FIX  Fixed broken startup under OSX Mavericks
ADD Added ability to modify pdata of offline players
ADD Added map categories
FIX Fixed mp_falldamage
FIX Adjusted NPC default weapons
FIX Improved Fist hit detection 
FIX Fixed Delay not updating on Dynamite tool
FIX Fixed Keys not updating on Dynamite, Emitter, Hoverball, Lamp, Light and Thruster
FIX Fixed slider tool bugs
FIX TTT: fix thrown knife sometimes dealing double damage
FIX Fixed texture for TextBox_Disabled
FIX Fixed GM:GetVehicles()
FIX Added blur recomputation to Derma_DrawBackgroundBlur
FIX Fixed button Toggle State updating improperly
FIX Fixed Ã¢â‚¬Å“Remove on ExplodeÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ not updating on dynamite
FIX Fixed No Collide undo & remove all constraints
FIX Changed all default keys to their Numpad counterparts
FIX TTT: remove old resources.lua (clients already have all resources)
FIX  Reduced gap between entities in Axis, Motor, Wheel, Emitter & Weld Easy tools
FIX Added ghosting for Hoverball, Emitter, Light & Lamp tools
FIX Removed useless code parts/Improved code formatting
FIX Improved positioning for Lamp & Light tools
FIX Fixed Glow for Button & Light
FIX Removed glow sprite for Light when light is off
FIX Animations made faster for Button,
FIX Award vehicle run-over kills to the driver
FIX TTT: Clean up C4 timer positioning

===========================================
Changelog v13.09.12
===========================================

FIX  Fixed crash when using Matrix:Scale, Translate, Rotate wrong
FIX  Added extra debug to blue screen errors
FIX  If a startup crash is detected we will automatically verify install
FIX  Fixed gamemode name not updating with server changes
FIX  Fixed util.SteamIDTo64 spouting rubbish
FIX  Added GM:PreCleanupMap
FIX  Added GM:PostCleanupMap
FIX  Fixed large avatars being partially broken
FIX  Fixed NPCs not talking or playing scenes

===========================================
Changelog v13.07.05
===========================================

NEW Workshop addons can be downloaded when joining a server
NEW Added resource.AddWorkshop( workshopid )
FIX Fixed fonts being invisible on resolution change 
FIX Fixed crash when starting map 
FIX Fixed sound.PlayURL not always calling the callback properly 

===========================================
Changelog v13.06.20
===========================================

NEW Added a bunch of loose files into vpk's for faster load times
FIXED Fixed soundchannel:SetVolume( float )
FIXED sound.PlayURL can now handle playlists
FIXED Fixed 'BASS' error on launch
FIXED Fixed missing scenes causing low FPS with NPCs
FIXED Fixed sqlite db's getting stomped by updates/verifying cache
FIXED Fixed rope material crash exploits

===========================================
Changelog v13.06.11
===========================================

NEW Added OGG audio streaming
NEW Added sound.PlayURL( Ã¢â‚¬Å“urlÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, Ã¢â‚¬Å“3d mono loop noplayÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, callback_func )
NEW Added soundchannel:Play()
NEW Added soundchannel:Stop()
NEW Added soundchannel:Pause()
NEW Added soundchannel:SetVolume( float )
NEW Added soundchannel:SetPos( vecPos )
NEW Creating a timer now returns a timer object
NEW Added bodygroups changer to player editor
FIXED Fixed other game content not mounting on Linux
FIXED Fixed broken MP3 streaming
FIXED Fixed some Linux case sensitivity problems when mounting other content

===========================================
